sect3.title: Configuration Information
sect3.para: If you use inetd, add the fam entry to /etc/inetd.conf with the following command:

screen.userinput: echo "sgi_fam/1-2 stream rpc/tcp wait root /usr/bin/fam fam" >> /etc/inetd.conf

sect3.para: If you use xinetd, add an entry to /etc/xinetd.conf with the following command (be sure the "nogroup" group exists):

para.screen: cat >> /etc/xinetd.conf << "EOF" # description: FAM - file alteration monitor service sgi_fam { type = RPC UNLISTED socket_type = stream user = root group = nogroup server = /usr/bin/fam wait = yes protocol = tcp rpc_version = 2 rpc_number = 391002 } EOF
